meta.title: Sign Up - FutureSphere
meta.description: Register for a FutureSphere account to access exclusive features and stay updated with the latest technology trends. Sign up now to join our community!

email.error: Please enter a valid email address (example@example.com)

password.error: Your password must be at least 8 characters long and include a combination of uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

terms.text: I agree with terms of usage and privacy policy.
terms.required: You must agree to the terms
